short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays CPM (Cent per mile) ratio on rocketmiles.com search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin displays the cents per mile ratio on the popular hotel search engine rocketmiles.com. Because it's not always the cheapest price or the most miles that you're interested in, but how many miles you get for your money.
